author: dirkjaeckel
content:
I am looking for discv5 implementations (in Java or Kotlin) that can be used on Android devices. I found https://github.com/Consensys/discovery. Unfortunately I could not find any documentation for it. 
I also found: https://github.com/apache/incubator-tuweni but it has been archived as of Aug 1, 2023. Is there a successor repository?

author: daniellehrner
content: https://github.com/Consensys/discovery is used in Teku and is battle tested. I think the Tuweni library is not used much. So I would recommend to check how the discovery library is used in https://github.com/Consensys/teku and used that as an example.
